google_play_reviews.content: Good if you're a prepper
Fun to read when bored, and it's quick thorough knowledge, also fun to test some of the techniques
While I hope I won't ever be in a situation where I need this info, it is very handy to have and just interesting to read.
Learned a lot and it helped me to plan my EDC kits and. More extensive equipment. It might have some topics where everyone disagrees but it's 98% on point.
Good app with easy and understandable interface
This is a great way to learn survival. It isn't boring to read, either. It is also great if you're in a pinch with no wifi. It's full of useful info.

When I read the intro to the words "let's work toward a future without wars where such a manual isn't needed" I started crying. Dear people, please, please check out the Creative Society project. Under what is coming, some of us will be able to survive only a few days longer than the others. Watch the "Global Crisis. Responsibility" conference on December 2. We can THRIVE! We still have a chance. We don't have to "survive".
Good s
Good short info to survive. Thx a lot
The guide is one among the best books I have ever read. My sincere greetings goes to the developer whose guidance will benefit to those who find themselves in the midst of wilderness.
Good
Cool stuff
All you could need. Information and education
The app that I will never uninstall from.any if my devices
So far this app has been a very great. I am a big outdoors person, so this is very cool
Exceptional
I will never uninstall this off my phone and everyone phone I will have after this one will have this app on it! Thank you for this perfect app!!
Now I'll use this book it's too good to be true
Install this for the inevitable downfall of humanity. Or yourself, if ur irresponsible like me.
Cool resource! Very informative.
Lots of great info
Offline survival information
(+10☆) Very much usefull, but must read it before disaster strikes.
You'll be glad you have it.
bless the person who made this app it really helps in desperate situation
Nice work!
Great lol
helpful.

Never , knew how to, learn , wareness , when I am alone.i. need to learn how to, look for food, weather , equipment, like , rain boots rain glove, rain coat, and especially , how to use to make fire, only when stranded, tent, water supply,.
I love it

The fact that it is an offline app full of life saving information that is easy to understand leads me to believe this app is worth 5 stars. I just turned 40 a couple of months ago. I'm from the Ozarks in a family that believes in these skills. It's great to have an app that teaches life saving skills that are proven effective. Thank you!
Great prep app for the un prepared in case of "problem" around the glove
A really good app .highly recommended. Writen like a list of notes .everything and more is there .most likely the world's best survival guide.
Very informative thanks for ur hard work

google_play_reviews.userName: L I T T L E F L O W E R
google_play_reviews.content: This is must
Best survivals app I have ever met

Worth reading BEFORE disaster strikes & bookmarking a few of the more-likely relevant articles for any anticipated trip or change of circumstances. Overall pretty good, though there's still room for improvement.
Informative and helpful. I've used this app since it came out. I'm a regular outdoor survivalist ,love this !!!
One of the best apps there are, very light, easy to understand and also practical. This is the one I'll trust when camping

For a survival manual it's really good, some instructions and descriptions aren't easy to follow but it holds extensive information about first aid and basic medicine, different climates, shelter making, psychology (mental wellbeing) and much more. It has information for all classes, to the noobie that wanted to know more to the army veteran. It teaches you how to make survival kits too.
Extremely useful, well organised, and compact!
Nice
Highly usefull and well organized
To the point. Direct and we'll explained
Pass
Great To Have
Great information, too bad my GF can't get this app on her newer phone. Please make it accessible to all phones some day. Thank you
Absolutely brilliant I loved the introduction and it is just an all round inspired app
Fulfills its purpose and free
Quite interesting

God Bless this Mess...as Long as you have This Great Survivalist App! If you Don't, then DOWNLOAD This app, The Holy Grail of #OfflineSurvivalGuides, W/ A PENCHANTS, so as to HELP Us ALL HAVE A CHANCE AT SURVIVING, PRETTY MUCH ANYTHING, AS THOROUGHLY INDEXED THE VAST CONTENTS VARIOUS DETAILED TACTICS, TECHNIQUES & OTHER WISDOMS OF STAYING INTREPID IN ALL ENVIROMENTZ, BOTH WILD🏕️ & 🌇 URBAN LIFE-HACKZ, SURVIVALIST'Z SECRETZ, ALONG W/ HELPFUL HINTZ, FYI's & HOW-TO LESSONS, ETC. #SURVIVOR'SALMANAC
It saved my life 🧬
Very decent. Literally saved my life
Really cool tool, as a person interested in survivalism, it has been a super interesting resource.
Thanks for this, it teaches very many skills and a mindset that is not only useful for surviving but useful for day to day life
This app helped me survive Brazil , Numero Uno 🇧🇷
Great tips, will be using, the only problem is that the plant section doesn't have pictures, although quite necessary
I like it

useful. accords with some situations I havel found myself in. Some I never havel been in yet. Since I carry extra charging batteries it will always be available. I'm going to read & STUDY. & practise it. Just like my boyscout & hunter safety books. Now I mostly fish but that doesn'tguarantee bad things can't happen !
10/10 no complaints here
It's good to have, but hope you'll never have to use it. Rule number #1 of wilderness survival is don't get into a situation where you need to survive
Fantastic level of information. Would recommend to anyone who wants to be prepared.

This app looks to be invaluable in the right setting. The state of the world is such that this may be the right setting. I do read it when Boost loses my connection, frequently. There is a lot of information to digest. I am still getting a feel for for it. I don't think I am wasting my time .
A very nice apps.
This is really the best survival app I got 😊. It is really useful. Thanks to the creator 👍.

Some of this is helpful, and some is crank material. After a quick read through the Power section I came across things like "just build some electronics" and "create a generator using components found in your microwave" so I feel the need say this. In a survival scenario please don't give yourself radiation sickness or electrical burns while you're messing around with stuff you don't understand. Author tanked their credibility with that section imo. Stay safe out there.
I got lost in the forest and this app stoped me from going all lord of the flies on the chinabarries there, 10 / 10
Never needed it yet but seems thorough
I love it.
If you have less than 10 megabytes on your device I recommend to download this app with it
It was amazing until I reset the phone and never bothered to diwnload it bcuz i only have 8gb
I didnt uae it but i ljow irs gonna be good
good

You know it's very rare that i give out 5 stars but, the composers of the litature in this online treasure is much need. The information is spot-on. I made sure that all my family make a quick study and reference to this educational app. Especially my girls.
It's really helpful. Would like pictures of plants. But great information.
Verry good Won a capture the flag game with comoflage
A. Must have.
Great offline guide!!
An app to promote health and survival, and it's offline! Thanks for creating this! I hope it receives more updates and tips. Thanks dev!
Love it .. 😎👍
Great offline free information
Really streamline good app honestly I think every single person should down on this in case of an emergency or if I just want to camp in the bush
Helpful
I like that the app doesn't take up too much space on my phone, so I can keep it for emergencies only. I feel reassured of its presence, just in case the unthinkable happens to me...
Uneasily Interesting...
It only can acquire at the specific location you canst try at home or work.
Pretty in-depth app with a lot of information. A nice app to read occasionally or to consult In a non critical emergency.

worth downloading. simple truth about survival, written well enough to allow most people to read in a bad situation. the personal tone the author takes at times may even make a lone person less alone.
Honestly very entertaining to read when offline. Also since it runs offline you could use it if you happen to have your phone in a situation.
This app is very helpful plz try this app
I recommend this to everyone who can read.
More thwn the basics best survival app of all time

Weirdly, this is one of the best mental health apps I have ever used. The advice here rivals TherapyTok. Anyway, also a great way to force yourself to relax, because if you're reading something practical, your brain can't whine that resting is useless! An absolutely essential download for anyone.
Awesome! If you don't have a pdf reader available for the actual manual. No complaints, thank you.
This app is great! So if i get lost in the forest/rainforest/jungle i will be able to survive and my dad and i are planing to go mushroom hunting so this is really useful
Will always have this installed on my daily driver.
Most useful app I've ever seen
Full of great information and facts just lacks photos for people who are visual when learning so just a heads up for others other than that great app would 100% recommend this
Ace app🤓👍
